name: CardDom
description:
For a long time, peace reigned in your castle, alongside you of course. Then the neighbouring kingdoms of Red and Purple started a war with each other, and your reign was caught in the middle of it.

Your objective is to manage the finances, army, population and religion of the kingdom and the relationships with the neighbouring kingdoms. You can do so by choosing one of the two options that every event gives you.

Credits

Alberto Bruschi

Alessandro Perelli (Essojadojef)

Cristiano Recalcati

Luigi Camilli (@PostinoLu)

Resources
